transcript:
Customer: Sir aur receive karte hain.
Halo.
Executive: Halo. Haan ji Sadanand sir ji aawaz aa raha hai?
Customer: Haan aa raha hai.
Executive: Ji ji. Good morning sir kya haal chaal hai aapke?
Customer: Dusra ek mera firm hai Victory Enterprises.
Executive: Haan kya naam se hai?
Customer: Victory Enterprises.
Executive: Victory Enterprises. Theek hai kya jaanna hai uske bare mein?
Customer: Kya ho gaya wo maine chalu kiya tha lekin GST number mera nahi tha.
Executive: Haan theek hai. Humko de deta hu uska number. Halo.
Customer: Haan haan ji to bataiye uske baad. Haan mera nahi tha dusre ka tha to maine wo paisa bharana band rakha kyun lafda ho jayega kuch to mere ko takleef ho jayegi. To abhi mera GST number aaya hai. To wo chalu karne ka kuch to bhi ₹2900 aur 3400 kuch to bhi paisa tha wo monthly bharne ka tha. To Deepa madam ko phone kiya tha main Saturday wo boli main chutti hai abhi do din. To fir ek aadmi ka phone aaya mere ko saaf ka. Wo bole main chalu karke deta hai aur baad mein do mahine ke baad aap bada chalu karo uske upar wo mera khud ka firm hai.
Executive: Jo hamari Aditya Enterprises chal rahi hai wo fir kiske GST hai?
Customer: Wo baad mein dekhenge na pehle ye to chalu karenge wo to ye 17 aur ye 17 aa jayega na na wo 15 aane wala hai wo sir bole. Wo bole tum GST number bhej do aur detail bhej do maine diya baad mein bola aapka whatsapp number do. Unhone wapis phone nahi kiya bola aapko phone karke dete hain.
Executive: Sir aapne to customer care mein call kiya tha sir aap mujhe phone karte na directly.
Customer: Chalta hai sir waisa. Aap directly mujhe phone kar lete koi. Main inse inse hi phone karte hain hamesha yahi phone number use karta hai aapko karne ka rahega to.
Executive: Nahi nahi mera personal number hai na aapke pass 9523 wala number us pe call kar liya kijiyega. Matlab aapka ye concern hai ki aapke pass pehle Victory wali ek GST thi Victory Enterprise naam se.
Customer: Wo band pada tha GST number. Wo band ho gaya ab usne aapke baad aapne fir ek GST number nikala usme se service lena chahte hain aap. Haan. Ye bol rahe hain. Haan. Chaliye theek hai aur iska reason ye hai ki abhi aapka jo Aditya Enterprises mein hai 1742 mil rahe hain wo 42 kam ho ja rahe hain na.
Customer: Kitna ho raha hai?
Executive: Abhi jo Aditya Enterprises aapki firm chal rahi hai usme jo 1742 milti hai aapko wo kam ho ja rahi hai isiliye aap aur ek service lena chahte hain aur ek GST se hai na? Haan na abhi dekho na abhi abhi subah subah baithe to aath liya. Abhi kal aath liya to mere ko che din baithna hi padega.
Customer: Sir Aditya sir hamari to baat chal rahi thi Aditya Enterprises mein services upgrade karne ki usme hum aapko Aditya Aditya ye mere nahi mere dost ki hai wo alag GST number use karunga aapko karne ka to karo aage wo mera share ka business hai uska. Mere ko bola maine India mart ke upar liya tha kuch problem aaya tha maine bola jaan de fir main karta hai. Mera GST number aane tak. To ye Aditya Enterprises bhi aapka GST nahi hai?
Customer: Mera dost hai mere partner ka bhi hai lekin wo bolta hai mere ko nahi interest maine kiya tha chalu lekin jitna man tha utna nahi ho gaya wo bola chal de mere ko GST number apan wo chalu karenge bola karo chalu pura paisa main sab raha tha udhar. Hmm. Koi baat nahi abhi aapki kisse baat hui hai naye GST se service live karne ki?
Executive: Naam nahi malum Deepa madam ke pass phone karne ke baad ek phone aaya tha mere ko ki hum chalu karke denge Monday ko. Main bola mera chalu hai Aditya karke. Hmm hmm. Deepa madam khud karti rahengi to karo nahi to fir main unko phone karta hu Monday ko.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Koi baat nahi ek kaam kijiye main aapko whatsapp pe hello dal deta hu aap mujhe pehle GST wagera detail wagera bhej dijiye. Hmm. Main baat karke dekhta hu ek baar sir se hai na jaise possible hota hai. Abhi dekho Victory Enterprises nikala na to band hai wo sab sirf dusre ka number tha main dar gaya uske se maine band rakha.
Customer: Main samajh gaya aapki baat ko aapki baat ko main samajh gaya. Wo Vicky ne karke diya tha Vicky Vicky karke wo Gudgaon ke chokre the bahut achche chokre the unhone karke diya tha wo. Unhone bola maine chhoda hai main Faridabad ko kam lag gaya aisa ho gaya tha.
Executive: Chaliye koi baat nahi ye main baat karke dekhta hu ek baar. Sadanand sir iske alawa koi aur issue to nahi hai aapko abhi aapne customer care mein call kiya hai 9696 pe to ek concern raise ho jati hai ki aapko koi issue hai to jaise hamari baat ho gayi hai to main us concern ko. Issue nahi kuch mera issue nahi kuch mera sirf ye hai ye chalu karne ka aapko humne pehle phone karenge nahi to aap bolenge chalu karne ka to mere ko koi nahi bolega. Wo to wo jo saare wo mere ko paisa dene wale nahi hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha. Koi baat nahi main baat karke dekhta hu ek baar hai na. Aap check karke dekho Victory Enterprises ka sirf wo GST number laga ke ye laga ke ho sakta hai to main kal paisa bhar sakta hu uska. Aap mujhe ek baar whatsapp pe bhej dijiye GST number theek hai. Main check karwa leta hu fir aapko feedback karta hu fir aapko connect karta hu theek hai. Abhi ke liye jo aapne 9696 pe call kiya hai customer care pe ek concern raise ho jati hai wo main close kar deta hu sir. Feedback ke liye aayega kindly feedback de dijiyega. Chaliye theek hai.
Customer: Chaliye theek hai.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai main close karta hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to activate old GST number.

- Current buyleads are less.



Resolution:

- Asked to share GST details on WhatsApp.

- Will check and connect with the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will check and connect.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, buyleads, subscription, whatsapp
